data.title: Robert Sterling
data.meta_description: Robert Troy Sterling 55, of Steubenville, Ohio passed away November 20, 2021 at Allegheny General Hospital, Pittsburgh.    Troy worked for JSW Steel and was a m
data.text:
Troy worked for JSW Steel and was a member of the American Legion Post #33. He enjoyed spending time with his family and his dogs, fishing and the outdoors.

He was born March 29, 1966 in Steubenville, Ohio a son of the late Charles and Doris (Chamberlain) Sterling. In addition to his parents he was preceded in death by his sister, Patricia Vudrogovic.

He is survived by his wife Nannette (DiMichele) Sterling; two sons, Josh (Mariah Rotter) Sterling and Adam Sterling both of Steubenville; two grand- children, Roman and Addalynn; two brothers, Lee Sterling of Steubenville and Jeff Sterling of Alabama.

Friends will be received at the Everhart-Bove Funeral Home, 685 Canton Rd., Wintersville on Wednesday from 12 Noon until time of services at 4 PM.

www.everhart-bove-funeralhomes.com
